title: New: Voyager – Midnight Fang
content:
Since Introducing Voyager amidst the dying embers of 2012, it’s clear that the Atlanta based group aren’t merely a one-hit wonder and have plenty more tricks up their billowing sleeves.

New gem and EP closer Dawn picks up where their previous outings left off, with an intoxicating mix of The XX and Youth Lagoon, spurred on by warped folk-pop mystic. Also, as well as uploading this final track from the EP, the group have also made the full release, title Midnight Fang, available to download via a name your price deal over at their bandcamp.
